name: Drive Me Insane!
description:
Welcome to DRIVE ME INSANE!

As you may have guessed, your goal in this game is to drive your poor passengers insane to earn RAGE POINTS.

WASD/arrows to drive, [Space] to engane the handbrake

All characters are based on various clichés, so please don't take this too serious.

Thank you to all my friends that contributed to this game:

Raphael Dombrowski: Made awesome music and soundeffects! Also lent his voice to various characters.

Matthias Lehner: Chief artist & writer: drew the tiles, characters, car and breathed live into the characters by writing their backstory! Passionate voice acting!

Josef Hinterleitner: Initial tilemap designs. Moving voice acting performance!

Raphael Pruckner: Ultra realistic vehicle exhaust particle system!

Florian Artner: Artist #2, thanks for the speedometer!

Raphael Sperlich: Initial GUI work. 

Credits

initial steering script (heaviliy modified in the meantime) was made by ivan skodje: https://www.github.com/ivanskodje-godotengine/Vehicle-Controller-2D
